price: 93. en dehors d’Allah ? Vont-ils vous secourir ou se secourir eux-mêmes ? »
arabic: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ هَلۡ يَنصُرُونَكُمۡ أَوۡ يَنتَصِرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: min dūni al-lahi hal yanṣurūnakum aw yantaṣirūna
